About Me

My name is Denys

I want to become a professional web developer, because I'm good at it and most importantly I enjoy the process.

My previous experience was in a large pipe manufacturing company for local and overseas deliveries, in which I was the one doing the goods following.

I believe that everything is possible for a person! The main thing is to set a goal and go to your dream!

Skills

What I use in work

HTML5

Markup language used for structuring and presenting content on the World Wide Web. It is the fifth and final major HTML version that is a World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) recommendation.

CSS3

It is a style sheet language which is used to describe the look and formatting of a document written in markup language. It provides an additional feature to HTML.

Java Script

Dynamic computer programming language. It is lightweight and most commonly used as a part of web pages, whose implementations allow client-side script to interact with the user and make dynamic pages.

React

Is a JavaScript library for rendering user interfaces (UI). UI is built from small units like buttons, text, and images. React lets you combine them into reusable, nestable components.

Redux

Redux is a pattern and library for managing and updating application state, using events called "actions".

SASS

Sass is the most mature, stable, and powerful professional grade CSS extension language in the world.
